levels.description: <$ba.liftoff>Takes Off</>, Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>; attacks 2 enemies at once plus <@ba.vup>1</> additional <@ba.vup>flying</> enemy; when hitting <@ba.vup>flying</> enemies, <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> them for <@ba.vup>{attack@sluggish}</>s
